actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (5d6 + 4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: The whale can't use its blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The whale can hold its breath for 30 minutes

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The whale has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.
